Pre-Game Insights: India may experiment with new faces in the final T20I against Bangladesh after sealing the series.
Indian Assistant Coach Ryan ten Doeschate mentioned that new players like Harshit Rana, Tilak Verma, Ravi Bishnoi, and Jitesh Sharma could get a chance to play.
Ryan ten Doeschate emphasized the team's all-out attacking style of cricket and the importance of building a strong core of players for upcoming tournaments.
The match serves as a chance for misfiring openers Sanju Samson and Abhishek Sharma to come good.
